item.title: Roadworks sign left behind by VM after they finally completed their repair work reported under Fix My Street reports 7511420, 7674119, 7934039 and 7959262. It has taken more than 7 months for GCC to get VM to undertake these repairs. Please get them to remove this sign ASAP so that we can finally have an obstructed pavement., 7th October
item.description:
On the pavement outside 211 Gloucester Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 211, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Laxton Walk needs a clean again., 7th October
item.description:
Laxton Walk could do with the cleansing team coming through again. Residents are fed up with cleaning it, the drains are blocked again and litter is building up along the walk.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Laxton Walk, St Mark's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ash tree needs pruning, 7th October
item.description:
The said tree is overhanging 269 and large branches have been falling down. Potential damage to our vehicles, people and property. Could this tree please be pruned before the winter storms begin.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 269, Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Ash Tree located on Highway land
